card.name: Adanto Vanguard
card.text: As long as Adanto Vanguard is attacking, it gets +2/+0. Pay 4 life: Adanto Vanguard gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

card.name: Admiral Beckett Brass
card.text: Others Pirates you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of your end step, gain control of target nonland permanent controlled by a player who was dealt combat damage by three or more Pirates this turn.

card.name: Air Elemental
card.text: Flying

card.name: Angrath's Marauders
card.text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Anointed Deacon
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target Vampire get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Arcane Adaptation
card.text: As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

card.name: Arguel's Blood Fast
card.text: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, you may transform Arguel's Blood Fast.

card.name: Temple of Aclazotz
card.text: (Transforms from Arguel's Blood Fast.) {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

card.name: Ashes of the Abhorrent
card.text: Players can't cast spells from graveyards or activate abilities of cards in graveyards. Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Atzocan Archer
card.text: Reach When Atzocan Archer enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Axis of Mortality
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have two target players exchange life totals.

card.name: Belligerent Brontodon
card.text: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

card.name: Bellowing Aegisaur
card.text: Enrage - Whenever Bellowing Aegisaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: Bishop of Rebirth
card.text: Vigilance When Bishop of Rebirth attacks, you may return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bishop of the Bloodstained
card.text: When Bishop of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life for each Vampire you control.

card.name: Bishop's Soldier
card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Blight Keeper
card.text: Flying {7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blight Keeper: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Blinding Fog
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn. Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Bloodcrazed Paladin
card.text: Flash Bloodcrazed Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.

card.name: Blossom Dryad
card.text: {T}: Untap target land.

card.name: Bonded Horncrest
card.text: Bonded Horncrest can't attack or block alone.

card.name: Boneyard Parley
card.text: Exile up to five target creature cards from graveyards. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put all cards from the pile of your choice onto the battlefield under your control and the rest into their owners' graveyards.

card.name: Brazen Buccaneers
card.text: Haste When Brazen Buccaneers enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Bright Reprisal
card.text: Destroy target attacking creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Burning Sun's Avatar
card.text: When Burning Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent and up to one target creature.

card.name: Call to the Feast
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with Lifelink.

card.name: Cancel
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Captain Lannery Storm
card.text: Haste Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Captivating Crew
card.text: {3}{R}: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Carnage Tyrant
card.text: Carnage Tyrant can't be countered. Trample, hexproof

card.text: Trample, haste

card.text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked with a creature this turn.

card.text: Equipped creature has flying. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.text: When Conqueror's Galleon attacks, exile it at end of combat, then return it to the battlefield transformed under you control. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.text: Destroy target creature. Create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.text: Dark Nourishment deals 3 damage to target creature or player. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Deadeye Tormentor

card.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Exile two target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Deadeye Tracker explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Deathgorge Scavenger
card.text: Whenever Deathgorge Scavenger enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, you gain 2 life. If a noncreature card is exiled this way, Deathgorge Scavenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.text: Lifelink When Queen's Agent enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Queen's Commission
card.text: Create two 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.

card.name: Raging Swordtooth
card.text: Trample When Raging Swordtooth enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each other creature.

card.name: Raiders' Wake
card.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life. Raid - At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Rallying Roar
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.

card.name: Rampaging Ferocidon
card.text: Menace Players can't gain life. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Ranging Raptors
card.text: Enrage - Whenever Ranging Raptors is dealt damage, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Raptor Hatchling
card.text: Enrage - Whenever Raptor Hatchling is dealt damage, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

card.name: Ravenous Daggertooth
card.text: Enrage - Whenever Ravenous Daggertooth is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Regisaur Alpha
card.text: Other dinosaurs you control have haste. When Regisaur Alpha enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

card.name: Repeating Barrage
card.text: Double Volley deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Raid - {3}{R}{R}: Return Double Volley from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if you attacked with a creature this turn.

card.name: Revel in Riches
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

card.name: Rigging Runner
card.text: First strike Raid - When Rigging Runner enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Rile
card.text: Rile deals 1 damage to target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Ripjaw Raptor
card.text: Enrage - Whenever Ripjaw Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.

card.name: Ritual of Rejuvenation
card.text: You gain 4 life. Draw a card.

card.name: River Heralds' Boon
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Merfolk.

card.name: River Sneak
card.text: River Sneak can't be blocked. Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, River Sneak gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: River's Rebuke
card.text: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.

card.name: Rootbound Crag
card.text: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Rowdy Crew
card.text: Trample When Rowdy Crew enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards at random. If two cards that share a card type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Rowdy Crew.

card.name: Ruin Raider
card.text: Raid - At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Rummaging Goblin
card.text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

card.name: Run Aground
card.text: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Ruthless Knave
card.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool". Sacrifice three Treasures: Draw a card.

card.name: Sailor of Means
card.text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Sanctum Seeker
card.text: Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sanguine Sacrament
card.text: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Savage Stomp
card.text: Savage Stomp costs {2} less to cast if it targets a Dinosaur you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Search for Azcanta
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard. Then if you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Search for Azcanta.

card.name: Azcanta, the Sunken Ruin
card.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {2}{U}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Seekers' Squire
card.text: When Seeker's Squire enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Sentinel Totem
card.text: When Sentinel Totem enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}, Exile Sentinel Totem: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

card.name: Settle the Wreckage
card.text: Exile all attacking creatures target player controls. That player may search his or her library for that many basic land cards, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

card.name: Shadowed Caravel
card.text: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Shadowed Caravel. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Shaper Apprentice
card.text: Shaper Apprentice has flying as long as you control another Merfolk

card.name: Shapers of Nature
card.text: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Shapers' Sanctuary
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

card.name: Sheltering Light
card.text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)

card.name: Shining Aerosaur
card.text: Flying

card.name: Shipwreck Looter
card.text: Raid - When Shipwreck Looter enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Shore Keeper
card.text: {7}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Shore Keeper: Draw three cards.

card.name: Siren Lookout
card.text: Flying When Siren Lookout enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Siren's Ruse
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under it's owner's control. If a Pirate was exiled this way, draw a card.

card.name: Siren Stormtamer
card.text: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Siren Stormtamer: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a creature you control.

card.name: Skittering Heartstopper
card.text: {B}: Skittering Heartstopper gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Skulduggery
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1.

card.name: Skyblade of the Legion
card.text: Flying

card.name: Skymarch Bloodletter
card.text: Flying When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sky Terror
card.text: Flying, menace

card.name: Slash of Talons
card.text: Slash of Talons deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Sleek Schooner
card.text: Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Slice in Twain
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card.

card.name: Snapping Sailback
card.text: Flash Enrage - Whenever Snapping Sailback is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (It must survive damage to get the counter.)

card.name: Sorcerous Spyglass
card.text: As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless their mana abilities.

card.name: Spell Pierce
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Spell Swindle
card.text: Counter target spell. Create X colorless Treasure artifact tokens, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. They have "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Spike-Tailed Ceratops
card.text: Spike-Tailed Ceratops can block an additional creature each combat.

card.name: Spreading Rot
card.text: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Star of Extinction
card.text: Destroy target land. Star of Extinction deals 20 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

card.name: Steadfast Armasaur
card.text: Vigilance {1}{W}, {T}: Steadfast Armasaur deals damage equal to its toughness to target creature blocking or blocked by it.

card.name: Stone Quarry
card.text: Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Storm Fleet Aerialist
card.text: Flying Raid - Storm Fleet Aerialist enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.

card.name: Storm Fleet Arsonist
card.text: Raid - When Storm Fleet Arsonist enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent sacrifices a permanent.

card.name: Storm Fleet Pyromancer
card.text: Raid - When Storm Fleet Pyromancer enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, Storm Fleet Pyromancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Storm Fleet Spy
card.text: Raid - When Storm Fleet Spy enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Storm Sculptor
card.text: Storm Sculptor can't be blocked. When Storm Sculptor enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sunbird's Invocation
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a card revealed this way with converted mana cost X or less without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Sun-Blessed Mount
card.text: When Sun-Blessed Mount enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Huatli, Dinosaur Knight, reveal it, then put it into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Sun-Crowned Hunters
card.text: Enrage - Whenever Sun-Crowned Hunters is dealt damage, it deals 3 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Sunpetal Grove
card.text: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sunrise Seeker
card.text: Vigilance When Sunrise Seeker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Sure Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Swamp
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swashbuckling
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.

card.name: Sword-Point Diplomacy
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. For each of those cards, put that card into your hand unless any opponent pays 3 life. Then exile the rest.

card.name: Tempest Caller
card.text: When Tempest Caller enters the battlefield, tap all creatures target opponent controls.

card.name: Territorial Hammerskull
card.text: Whenever Territorial Hammerskull attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Thaumatic Compass
card.text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. At the beginning of your end step, if control seven or more lands, transform Thaumatic Compass.

card.name: Spires of Orazca
card.text: (Transforms from Thaumatic Compass.) {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Untap target attacking creature an opponent controls and remove it from combat.

card.name: Thrash of Raptors
card.text: As long as you control another Dinosaur, Thrash of Raptors gets +2/+0 and has trample.

card.name: Thundering Spineback
card.text: Other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1. {5}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

card.name: Tilonalli's Knight
card.text: Whenever Tilonalli's Knight attacks, if you control a Dinosaur, Tilonalli's Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Tilonalli's Skinshifter
card.text: Whenever Tilonalli's Skinshifter attacks, it becomes a copy of another target nonlegendary attacking creature until end of turn.

card.name: Tishana's Wayfinder
card.text: When Tishana's Wayfinder enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Tishana, Voice of Thunder
card.text: Tishana, Voice of Thunder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size. When Tishana enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control.

card.name: Tocatli Honor Guard
card.text: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

card.name: Treasure Map
card.text: {1}, {T}: Scry 1. Put a landmark counter on Treasure Map. Then if there are three or more landmark counters on it, remove those counters, transform Treasure Map, and create three colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Treasure Cove
card.text: (Transforms from Treasure Map.) {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.

card.name: Trove of Temptation
card.text: Each opponent must attack you or a planeswalker you control with at least one creature each combat if able. At the beginning of you end step, create a colorless artifact token named Treasure with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool".

card.name: Unclaimed Territory
card.text: As Unclaimed Territory enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

card.name: Unfriendly Fire
card.text: Unfriendly Fire deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Unknown Shores
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. ({C} represents colorless mana.) {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Vampire's Zeal
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's Vampire, it gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Vance's Blasting Cannons
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast that card this turn. Whenever you cast your third spell this turn, you may transform Vance's Blasting Cannons.

card.name: Spitfire Bastion
card.text: (Transforms from Vance's Blasting Cannons.) {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {2}{R}, {T}: Spitfire Bastion deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Vanquisher's Banner
card.text: As Vanquisher's Banner enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

card.name: Vanquish the Weak
card.text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

card.name: Verdant Rebirth
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to its owner's hand." Draw a card.

card.name: Verdant Sun's Avatar
card.text: Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Vicious Conquistador
card.text: Whenever Vicious Conquistador attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Vineshaper Mystic
card.text: When VVineshaper Mystic enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target Merfolk you control.

card.name: Vona, Butcher of Magan
card.text: Vigilance, lifelink {T}, Pay 7 life: Destroy target nonland permanent. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Vraska, Relic Seeker
card.text: +2: Create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with menace. -3: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment. Create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." -10: Target player's life total becomes 1.

card.name: Vraska's Contempt
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Wakening Sun's Avatar
card.text: When Wakening Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all non-Dinosaur creatures.

card.name: Waker of the Wilds
card.text: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

card.name: Walk the Plank
card.text: Destroy target non-Merfolk creature.

card.name: Wanted Scoundrels
card.text: When Wanted Scoundrels dies, target opponent creates two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Watertrap Weaver
card.text: When Watertrap Weaver enters the battlefield, target target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Wildgrowth Walker
card.text: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildgrowth Walker and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Wily Goblin
card.text: When Wily Goblin enters the battlefield, creature a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool".

card.name: Wind Strider
card.text: Flash Flying

card.name: Woodland Stream
card.text: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
